DataElement.preferredName: Patient IGCCC Poor Risk Assessment Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information relating to if the patient has testicular poor risk disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A staging system for metastatic malignant germ cell tumors developed by the International Germ Cell Cancer Collaborative Group.  It is a factor-based system that produced three prognostic groups; good prognosis, intermediate prognosis, and poor prognosis._Of low value or worth._The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.

Property.preferredName: International Germ Cell Consensus Classification Poor Risk Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: A staging system for metastatic malignant germ cell tumors developed by the International Germ Cell Cancer Collaborative Group.  It is a factor-based system that produced three prognostic groups; good prognosis, intermediate prognosis, and poor prognosis.:Of low value or worth.:The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.longName: International Germ Cell Consensus Risk Classification
Concepts.definition: A risk classification system for malignant germ cell tumors developed by the International Germ Cell Cancer Collaborative Group.
The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
